name: Redhill Manor
description:
You are hired to guard an abandoned nursing home after the last guard left without a trace. 

You have been ordered to stay out of the house and keep the lights always on. 

After a powerful storm left the place without power, you must enter the place and fix the problem, but the place is haunted and it is up to you to uncover why.

Discover hidden secrets,

Survive against horrible spirits 

and find a way out of a place that is constantly trying to kill you!

If you try our demo, please consider leaving us some feedback
